Topic: # Topic is the suffix used in the MQTT messages (individual) or the name in the JSON messages
# Register is the register on the modbus device
# DomoticzIdx is the idx in MQTT messages on the domoticz/in topic
# Size is the size (in 16 bit words) of the register
# DataFormat is the format used for the read data  (see https://docs.python.org/2/library/struct.html) for a description
# Muliplier is used to scale the result (e.g. 0.01 divides the read value by 100)
# Output format  is the format for formatting the (float) result from the read data * multiplier
# Freuency is the max. interval (in seconds) for output between 2 MQTT messages for this register is timed_publish is set
# The Slave ID is assumed to be 1 (which is default for the DDS238)
# The function code used for reading is Read Holding Register (3) for the DDS238
# Data format for all registers is float. Polling interval is 15s.
# Defaults are set with a magic "DEFAULT" topic definition and
# are then inherited by subsequent register definitions  where ths specific column is not filled
# one (16bit) word, one decimal digit, unsigned
# 1 octet 3/ decimal digits /   signed  kW/kVAR, but we convert to W/var
